description: Categorized type or profile of the customer, defining characteristics, preferences, and behaviors in the dataset.

columns.date_id: Represents the date associated with a particular record. This column contains string values denoting dates and is crucial for temporal analysis in the dataset.
columns.month_id: Combination of year and month values representing a specific time period. This column facilitates temporal analysis, capturing the year and month associated with each record in the dataset.
columns.rm_key: Unique identifier or key associated with a customer relationship management (CRM) record. This column serves as a reference key, providing a distinct identifier for each record in the dataset.
columns.persona_nm: Name or label assigned to a customer persona. This column contains string values representing the descriptive name or label associated with various customer personas in the dataset.
